title: Disconnecting in game
body:
So im having an issue where i would disconnect when im in a game, and it would happen all game. There is nothing wrong with my wifi because i can browse fine. my main menu league is fine too, but when i go into a game then trouble starts. 
So i would disconnect then reconnect several times in game. this has never happened before.. started to start happening once **6.14** came out.

replies.body: Issues like this may be due to packet loss resulting from an unstable connection with your network reaching our servers.  Running on wifi could be a culprit, but I recommend going over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to troubleshoot this.  As a first step, I recommend trying a wired connection first to see if this changes your stability in-game.  If you  experience further connection problems please let me know!
Hi, ive tried changing my dns server and i still have the same problem
happened to me several times since 6.14
